DOC.brief_title: Happy Nurse Project : Lifestyle Interventions Maintain Healthy Mental State Hospital Nurses
DOC.detailed_description: The study explore effectiveness omega-3 fatty acid mindfulness-based stress management program maintain healthy mental state hospital nurse . The participant junior nurse work inpatient ward four general hospital Tama region Tokyo , clinically depress base score Hospital Anxiety Depression scale . The participant randomly allocate four intervention arm : 1 ) Mindfulness-based stress management program plus omega-3 fatty acid pill ; 2 ) Mindfulness-based stress management program plus placebo pill ; 3 ) Psychoeducation leaflet plus omega-3 fatty acid pill ; 4 ) Psychoeducation leaflet plus placebo pill . Thirty participant allocate arm . These intervention terminate 3 month registration participant . Stress management program conduct senior nurse four individual session within three month . Psychoeducation leaflet include information screen stress , sleep hygiene , relaxation , list consultant mental health . Information depression anxiety symptom ( primary outcome ) , insomnia , burnout , presenteeism , quality life , number incident accident work , sick leave consultation mental state , concentration fatty acid serum oxidative stress collect 3 month , 6 month ( primary time point ) 12 month registration participant . The primary outcome assess blind raters telephone . The outcome compare arm include stress management program without , arm include omega-3 fatty acid without , use mixed model repeat measure model .
